attributes.action: remove the building regulations application fee for double glazing as it adds £95 per home for a scrap of paper
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If i work self employed or even on my own home, we have had to send of for planning permission and a subsequent visit costing £95 for someone to check it complies with building regulations. the FENSA system is costly to join but for companies or people fitting lots of installations may work out less of a cost. but it is still a needless cost. a simple self certificate with a tick box to show compliance with regulations. these applications are also costly and cumbersome for local people.
